backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, places, routes, emergency data, and SOS snapshots with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected frontend files, components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summary list describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application router setup registering all routes, layout, theme, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen displaying an access denied message with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks admin role and shows a loading state or access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Route guard requiring Internet Identity login before showing protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling authentication flow and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, sidebar or mobile menu, content area, and footer, showing navigation only when the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Renders the navigation menu with route buttons and admin options based on user role, handling navigation events.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Displays the top header with branding, share button, emergency lookup, and login controls, plus a share dialog.
frontend/src/components/profile/Emergenc: Manages generating, storing, displaying, copying, and rotating an emergency access code tied to the user's principal ID.
Provides a form for saving next-of-kin and medical information, requiring an existing emergency access code.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a setup dialog prompting new authenticated users to create a basic profile by entering their name.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: Handles validation and uploading of license and ID documents with progress tracking and shows verification status.
frontend/src/components/share/FlyerPrevi: Renders a flyer preview with app branding, intro text, QR code canvas, and share URL, supporting loading state via isGenerating.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareDialo: Displays a dialog for generating, copying, sharing, and downloading a QR code and link, with navigation to view or export a flyer.
frontend/src/components/sos/PublicSOSCar: Shows emergency contact info and last known SOS location, including timestamps and map links for first responders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, verification, places, and routes using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying global styles.
frontend/src/lib/accessCode.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears a 12‑character access code using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/fileValidation.ts: Validates file size/type and provides a helper to format file sizes.
frontend/src/lib/flyerExport.ts: Exports a flyer DOM element as a PNG using a temporary canvas and SVG foreignObject.
frontend/src/lib/geolocation.ts: Retrieves the user's geolocation with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/lib/placeCategory.ts: Maps place categories to labels and provides helper utilities for category display.
frontend/src/lib/qr.ts: Implements a lightweight client‑side QR code generator with custom matrix creation.
frontend/src/lib/qrDownload.ts: Converts a canvas to a PNG blob and triggers a download.
frontend/src/lib/quickShare.ts: Shares a URL via Web Share API with clipboard fallback and status reporting.
frontend/src/lib/shareUrl.ts: Returns the app's canonical share URL based on window.location.origin.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Converts between dates and bigint timestamps and formats them.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Gets and clears URL parameters for both query and hash routing without reload.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, query client, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AddPlacePage.tsx: Form page for authenticated users to add a new place with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/AddRoutePage.tsx: Form page for creating and submitting a new route with start, destination, optional waypoints, date/time, and notes.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewPage.tsx: Admin interface to look up users by Principal ID and approve or reject their verification.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyLookupPage.t: Allows first responders to fetch emergency info using a driver's Principal ID and access code.
frontend/src/pages/FlyerPage.tsx: Generates a shareable flyer with a QR code, supporting auto-export, manual download, and link copying.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page introducing platform features and redirecting authenticated users to the places list.
frontend/src/pages/PlaceDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a selected place including description, category, location, and submitter info.
frontend/src/pages/PlacesListPage.tsx: Displays a searchable and filterable list of places with category selection and optional add-place button for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows the user's profile with verification, emergency access code, and emergency profile sections, loading data from user queries.
frontend/src/pages/RouteDetailPage.tsx: Placeholder page showing route details with a back navigation button.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesListPage.tsx: Lists the user's routes and allows searching routes by principal, with navigation to add new routes.
frontend/src/pages/SOSCardPage.tsx: Displays the user's emergency SOS card if available, loading emergency profile data and offering navigation to setup if missing.
frontend/src/pages/SOSPage.tsx: Allows users to capture their current location for SOS purposes and navigate to view their SOS card.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters and session-stored values, supporting hash and query string formats.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing the app’s current build state, requirements, features, known issues, and architectural notes.
